entry.title: Scratchy Head
entry.content:
My Phsychotherapist once told me, when I comb my hair, I should pull my hair out gently, and I do it too.

However, I sometimes feel like I have ants on my head, and it feels scratchy.

I often look myself at the mirror and focusing on my head skin if there is a blood shed or something like that because I scratched them often. But it didn’t then what it is?

I want to know what I am fighting..but it aint easy when you’re alone..

entry.title: Just One Tomapirin Today - Bliss
entry.content:
Couldn’t help it this morning, took Tomapirin and it helped. Baked the cake, finished it as I have to bring it there tomorrow morning, and felt the headache.

Attempted to take another Tomapirin, but thank God, it was gone all of sudden.

I don’t feel it right now, but I have the Radiologie CD result from the doc.

Still hoping it won’t be something to worry about.

Good night.

entry.title: A Must Hello World
entry.content: Another hello world post, if you’re listening.
